item.title: CV & Replication
item.description: Education Academic Productions Journal Articles Book Reviews Conference Presentations Education March 2017 — Present PhD Candidate in Political Science, Federal University of Pernambuco — UFPE (Recife, Brazil) Comparing Diplomatic Agendas: Thematic Emphases of Brazilian Presidents and Chancellors (1995 - 2019 [Provisional title of Thesis] March 2015 — February 2017 M.A. in Political Science, Federal University of Pernambuco — UFPE (Recife, Brazil)

item.title: Projects
item.description: 1. Comparing Rhetorical Agendas of Brazilian Foreign Policymakers The primary objective of this project is to carry out a long-term empirical analysis to discover and to compare the rhetorical agenda of the main actors involved with the outcomes of the Brazilian Foreign Policy. In this regard, my doctoral thesis and my master’s dissertation are both part and parcel of this undertaking. In the latter, I evaluated the historical construction behind the narrative and the use of the concepts of Latin America and South America in Brazilian diplomacy from 1995 to 2014.
